title: Meanwhile... Drew Barrymore Loves The Rain | New Zealand's Public Pooping Law
description:
Meanwhile... Our good friend Drew Barrymore is the most enthusiastic weather-lover we know, and New Zealand may soon update a law that allows people to defecate in public as long as no one is watching.
